results.name: a(n) = d(d(d(n))), the 3rd iterate of the number-of-divisors function with an initial value of n.
comment: The iterated d function rapidly converges to the fixed point 2.
The fourth iterate begins as follows:
reference: S. Ramanujan, Collected Papers, Ed. G. H. Hardy et al., Cambridge 1927; Chelsea, NY, 1962, p. 128. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 02 2014
link: Enrique Pérez Herrero, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
R. Bellman and H. N. Shapiro, On a problem in additive number theory, Annals Math., 49 (1948), 333-340.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_
